text: the thing I like most about AWS is that
you can solve so many different problems
whether it's deployments a unique
architecture where there is a very
specific business problem that you're
trying to overcome by using AWS you can
solve any one of them my name is Paul
cobblestone work is the CTO of service
here we are a mobile app for finding
service providers so if you ever needed
a cleaner or a plumber or an electrician
you could come onto our app and you can
create a job and the service providers
will quote back so you'll receive up to
five quotes from there you can choose
the best one based on the price the
profile of the service provider a team
of people came together and thought this
would be a great idea without knowing
for sure whether he a great idea we came
to Malaysia didn't have any funding at
the time we didn't have internet so we
went to a coffee shop in one of the
malls having no no office means that you
have to go with a cloud provider of some
sort for us it was a pretty easy
decision to choose AWS for developers
and solution architects in Southeast
Asia is very difficult to come by so
having someone who's really in touch
with the market which AWS is they've got
AWS user groups there are events they
have talks which you can go and present
to building up that sort of long-term
presence in the market means that we get
a lot more developers who will be using
AWS and who we can employ later on as we
grow we started off with a very vanilla
service which was the ec2 backed by an
RDS and it was load balance so using
elastic load balancer and quickly we
sort of now split out into lots of ec2
is managed by Beanstalk so all our
deployment we use CloudFront and we use
s3 for storing all our large data files
for service here basically we as a
start-up always have problems coming up
that we need to fix really immediately
and so AWS lambda was the perfect
solution for this one particular case
when the customer uses the service
provider they can provide a rating what
we're finding is that when they're
providing bad ratings we weren't quickly
reach
now to them to make sure that they had a
great experience so we use AWS lambda to
create a integration with slack which we
use for all our internal communications
when there is a bad review now the
operations team will be notified
straight away and they can reach out to
the customer and to the service provider
and make sure that they both have a
better experience the next time that
they use our app truth be told we have a
lot of fun on AWS in terms of the
developers that we have in-house and
also the people that were hiring when we
tell them about the ways that we use AWS
they're really excited by it it's
definitely one of the things that we
always bring up when we're hiring new
developers so I think in terms of
culture that's the that's the best part
there's new ways of doing business
there's new ways of developing new ways
of fixing problems which is what you
focus on us as a developer all the time
fixing problems now we've got three
thousand service providers on our
platform providing thousands of course
to customers every day so having a
platform that can keep up with the
products that we push out is really
important and AWS of course push out
products that we find useful and we know
that we can provide the right solutions
for their service providers in the
future
you
